message.body: I'm glad you love the Red Sox since we are legally obligated to focus only on them this weekend
We will only be pre-gaming, tailgating, watching the games and then post-gaming, with possible rioting
Do you know how grateful I am that the series is in St Louis while I'm up there?
But they are still here, in our hearts and minds
Sox fans have no hearts. Just beer and beards. Many beards
I hope ##### does well but the rest of them can bite me. I don't care about this series at all, can't stand the cardinals either
My sentiments exactly, except I know nothing about the cardinals
This will be a fun weekend. Ha ha
